Name: [Affinity] Un-Bear-Able Rage
Desc: Ben has evoked the Mindscape: <color=#FFAF2C>[Agile Adaptation]</color>. After launching a Dash Attack or Dodge Counter, your character can <color=#2BAD00>immediately follow up with</color> certain attacks near the end of the Basic Attack combo.
Desc2: Ben quotes an "angry price," an amount most ordinary people couldn't even dream of affording. Luckily, some unsavory characters down in the Hollows are going to cover the bill.
